title: Weather Presenter Says Goodbye After Many Years
summary: Carol Kirkwood is a weather presenter who has worked for the BBC for over 25 years. She announced that she is leaving in April. She told her friends on the BBC Breakfast show that she wants to spend more time with her husband, Steve. Carol has won many awards for being the best TV weather presenter. She started her job in 1998. This news is important because she is a well-known person on TV, and many people will miss her. Her announcement was emotional, and it shows how much she loves her work and her family.
